actions.committee: House Committee on Interior and Insular Affairs
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Interior and Insular Affairs.

official_title: A bill to amend section 5(c) of the National Trails System Act to require the Secretary of the Interior to study the feasibility of designating the Overmountain Men Victory Trail as a national scenic trail.

summary.text: Amends the National Trails System Act by requiring the Secretary of the Interior to study the feasibility of designating the Overmountain Men Victory Trail in the States of Tennessee, North Carolina, and South Carolina, as a national scenic trail.

titles.title: A bill to amend section 5(c) of the National Trails System Act to require the Secretary of the Interior to study the feasibility of designating the Overmountain Men Victory Trail as a national scenic trail.
